name: basketball
summary: Looking to pick up a new hobby? Or maybe just looking to get out of the house more? Come down to the park and shoot some hoops! Playing basketball is a great way to stay active, meet new people, and have some fun. So what are you waiting for?

name: fitness
summary: Looking to get fit? Come to our fitness center! We have everything you need to get in shape and feel great! Our knowledgeable staff will help you get started on your fitness journey and our state-of-the-art equipment will help you reach your goals!

name: badminton
summary: Come out and play badminton with us! It's a great way to get some exercise while spending time with friends.

name: beachwolley
summary: Looking for a fun and active way to spend your summer days? Then look no further than beach volleyball! Not only is beach volleyball a great workout, but it's also a ton of fun. So grab some friends, head to the beach, and join us!

name: bigair
summary: Looking to get big air? Look no further than our newest and most extreme sport, bigair! With our specially designed equipment and certified instructors, you'll be soaring through the air in no time!

name: archery
summary: Come one, come all! Practice your archery skills at our state of the art facility. Our expert instructors will help you perfect your technique.

name: dance
summary: Dance your way to a better body! Join our dance classes and get fit while having fun. Our experienced instructors will help you tone your body and improve your coordination.

name: box
summary: Looking to get fit and learn self-defense? Look no further than boxing! Boxing is a great way to get in shape, and it's a lot of fun too. So come on down to our gym and give it a try. You won't regret it!

name: taekwondo
summary: Looking for a way to get fit and have fun? Look no further than taekwondo! This exciting martial art is a great workout for your whole body, and you'll love learning all the cool moves. Come give taekwondo a try today!

name: football
summary: Looking for a way to get fit and have some fun? Why not try football! This high-intensity sport is a great way to get your heart pumping, and you'll quickly develop teamwork skills and make new friends. So come on out and give it a try â€“ you might just surprise yourself at how much you enjoy it!

name: swimming
summary: It's time to make a splash! Whether you're looking to cool off on a hot day or get a great workout, the pool is the perfect place to be. So dive in and enjoy all that the water has to offer!

name: diving
summary: Looking for an exhilarating way to get your heart pumping? Then diving is the perfect activity for you! There is nothing quite like the feeling of jumping into the deep and exploring the underwater world. Plus, diving is a great way to meet new people and make friends. So what are you waiting for? Grab your diving gear and let's go!

name: tabletennis
summary: Whether you're playing singles or doubles, table tennis is a great way to get moving and have a good time. This classic game is a great workout for your mind and body, and it's a lot of fun too! So grab a paddle and some balls, and let's get started!

name: hiking
summary: There's nothing like a hike in nature to clear your head and rejuvenate your soul. So lace up your hiking boots and let's hit the trail!

name: climbing
summary: Looking for a fun and challenging way to stay in shape? Look no further than indoor rock climbing! Climbing is a great full-body workout that will leave you feeling strong and accomplished. And what's more, it's a blast! So come on in and give it a try. We promise you won't be disappointed.

name: fencing
summary: Fencing is a great way to get active, meet new people, and challenge yourself. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pro, there's a place for you in the fencing community. So what are you waiting for? Pick up a sword and give fencing a try!
